author: elecharny
msg: Added some more modification and simplifications to fix DIRSERVER-868
The cache mechanism has been reinstalled, with a small modification : it's now a LRU cache.

author: elecharny
msg: Added the password into the class so that we can store it into the Authenticator cache. No need to create a new LdapPrincipal when an already stored principal exists.

author: jacopoc
msg: Misc ui refactorings for the 'Edit production run' screen:
added new screen to manage the fixed assets assigned to production runs tasks.
